Pre-Game Insights: Paul Stirling was particularly impressed with Ross Adair saying 'If there's one thing I know about it's striking a cricket ball - and very, very few players in the world strike it better than Ross'
Miscellaneous Highlights: Ireland will look back on 2024 as a year of promise, missed opportunities and, to be fair, some poor luck.
The team's two best batsmen Paul Stirling and Harry Tector must shoulder a lot of the blame for Ireland's disappointing season.
The coaching team look to have unearthed a couple of gems in Ross Adair and Gavin Hoey.
Others: Ireland will sign off their season knowing that a return of six victories from 18 white-ball matches is disappointing.
Cricket Ireland seem to view Test matches as a necessary nuisance, at best.
